(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

5,000mAh Super Battery

Never search for a power outlet again, the F91 5G offers a long lasting 5,000mAh battery that can last all day and all night. 18W Quick Charging along with Wireless Charger for a stress-free experience.

Unlock Your World

The F91 5G ensures total security for all your important applications and files. Unlocked your smartphone with a press of a finger or simply use its face ID technology.

Android 11

Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone, giving you powerful device controls, and easier ways to manager conversations, privacy setting and so much more.

The Power of 5G, F91 5G provides lightning-fast connectivity experience whenever and wherever you are
3-Day Battery to fit your busy lifestyle, a powerful 5,000mAh battery and 18W Quick charging along with 10W Wireless charging for a stress-free experience.
Boundless views with 6.8” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Use your phone’s NFC to make payments. Built-in Android Pay for quick contactless checkouts.
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek Dimensity810|6m, Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core 2.4GHz processor

Read more

Price: $249.99 - $174.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:44:23 UTC – Details)


More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1
Rear Camera: 48MP, F2.0 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 + 2MP, F2.4, Front Camera: 8MP, F2.2, Bluetooth 5.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41 – Dual SIM
International Model – No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost

4

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ViprTech Snowstorm (AMD) Black

Specifications: CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (4-Core @ 3.7Ghz Turbo) Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB RAM: 8GB DDR4 Primary Storage: 128GB M.2 SSD (Boot Drive) Secondary Storage: 500GB 7200RPM HDD NOTE:

Please keep in mind that brands/colors may not exactly match pictures, we use a variety of brands in our PCs.

Prebuilt gaming computer with awesome built-in RGB. This PC is not only a great entry point into PC gaming, it’s also great for everyday use, editing, day trading / crypto trading, and more!

Games tested:

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Far Cry

Grand Theft Auto V Overwatch

DoTA 2 Rocket League

Fortnite Minecraft

Roblox Team Fortress 2

League of Legends Overwatch

Although we test each build to ensure it can handle most popular games, please check the minimum specs for the specific game you want to play to make sure this computer meets those.

Insane Bootup Times

Take advantage of insanely fast bootup and loading times with the included 128GB M.2 SSD (brand/model may vary).

Built-In Gorgeous RGB Lighting

Light up your rig and showcase your internals with the ViprTech built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any true gaming PC.

Why choose us?

Affordable

Every PC is designed with affordability in mind, while preserving quality and reliability. Thus, keeping more money in your pocket.

Extensive Testing Process

Before a PC leaves our facility, it goes through a rigorous benchmarking and stress testing process, faulty or underperforming components are identified and replaced.

Made in the USA

Every one of our PCs is hand built by PC experts in the USA, providing jobs to Americans and ensuring we are able to provide the best quality systems possible.

Superior Support

We perform all technical support in-house. No more sitting on hold for hours, waiting in a call queue, or endlessly navigating through phone menu options, if you call you get a real person right away. We believe this is the only way to do it right.

System: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G (3.7GHz Turbo), AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 128GB M.2 SSD, 500GB HDD, Genuine Windows 10 Pro, RGB lighting enabled case
Showcase your internals with the built-in RGB lighting system, a must have for any gaming PC and sure to make your rig stand out. Controlled via a button on the case.olled via a button on the case.
Enjoy insanely fast bootup times with the included 128GB M.2 Boot SSD, while still having plenty of storage with the 500GB secondary drive. Easily add additional storage if desired or add more DDR4 RAM (supports up to 32GB) or a dedicated GPU for even better performance
Tested to run games such as: CSGO, Far Cry, GTA V, Overwatch, DoTA 2, Rocket League, Fortnite, Minecraft, Roblox, Team Fortress 2, and many more!
Every ViprTech PC is built by hand in the USA and is stress-tested extensively before shipping. We stand behind our product and include a free 1 year warranty.

  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 2GB

Product Description

ADVANCE L5

Effortless Screen

The Advance L5 showcases a pleasant 4″ display with vivid colors for a compact phone. play your favorite games or view the latest Netflix movie on the go with the mighty Advance L5.

Seamsless Performance

The Advance L5 is equipped with a 1.3GHz Quad-Core processor that will give users the ability to execute all tasks seamlessly.

Simple Form

Simple and easy does the job. the base foundation for the Advance L5 is that it takes all the unnecessary elements and removes it to give users a great design that is appealing to the eye. A beautiful pattern graces the battery cover for a great hand held experience.

ADVANCE L5

Storage

With 16GB of internal memory, all your pictures and videos can be stored and accessed with ease.

Dual SIM

Stay globally connected with friends and family while traveling the world. The Advance L5 comes with 3G 850/1700/1900 or 850/1900/2100 to ensure you always have access to worldwide carrier coverage while you’re on the go. Take advantage of different voice and data plans for better rates, better coverage and separate bills with the Advance L5 Dual SIM Slots.

A Camera For Any occasion

Snap those memorable moments with confidence on the ADVANCE L5’s 5 Megapixel main camera with LED flash. Smile and post the coolest selfie with a 2 Megapixel front camera.

4.0” Touchscreen Display
5MP Main Camera with flash + 2MP Selfie Camera
16GB Internal memory 512MB RAM Micro SD up to 64GB, 1.3GHz Quadcore processor with Mali-400 GPU
Unlocked and ready to use with your preferred GSM Carrier. Compatible with T-Mobile, Metro PCS, and others. Sim card not included. (Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile)

Product Description

G91 PRO

A MASTER PIECE

The all-new G91 PRO is a stunning of hardware that combines unparalleled engineering and master craft design. It has a perfect ergonomic form factor with a state-of-the-art appeal. Available in Moonstone and Graphite.

FULL HD+ EXPERIENCE

Witness the ultimate viewing experience with the masterfully crafted 6.7” FULL HD+ Infinity DOT display. From surfing the web to watching movies, everything will be more real. Enjoy your favorite TV shows and games without the screen getting on the way.

EXTREME GAMING

The G91 PRO includes the advance Mediatek Helio G90 gaming chipset so you can blast trough all levels of your favorite game without delay. This stunning device is also rocking the latest Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core architecture, this enhancement to your smartphone is second to none.

G91 PRO

WORK HARD, PLAY HARDER

The G91 PRO exceeds all expectations with no fear. It has a supercharged 6GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage for your utmost convenience.

A FRESH PERSPECTIVE

Details every aspect of your life. The G91 PRO has a quad rear camera combination that has all the functions you need to take perfect photos.

ANDROID 11

Go straight to the stuff that matters most. Because Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone. Giving you powerful device controls. And easier ways to manage conversations, privacy settings and so much more.

WORRY LESS, DO MORE

With 30W ultra Quick Charge, you can power up your G91 PRO over 50% in less than 30 minutes.

Powerful Three-day battery. Capture more of life without stopping to recharge thanks to a 5000mAh battery with 30W, you can power up over 50% charger in less than 30 minutes.
Capture the best images and take the best selfies, with the Quad A.I 48MP Samsung GM1 sensor camera
Gorgeous 6.7” Full HD+ Infinity dot display. Watch your favorite movies and play your favorite games with stunning color and resolution
Do more and play more! with the MediaTek helio |G90T Gaming Octa-Core 2.0GHz processor
Operating System: Android 11
Box Content: G91 PRO, Screen protector, Rugged Case, Quick Guide, Sticker Charger, Type-C Cable, Headset, Sim Key
Global GSM and LTE bands for Latin America, North America, Europe, Africa LTE Bands: 1/2/3/4/5/7/12/17/28

The G91 PRO includes the advance Mediatek Helio G90 gaming chipset so you can blast trough all levels of your favorite game without delay. This stunning device is also rocking the latest Arm Cortex A76 Octa-Core architecture, this enhancement to your smartphone is second to none.

Read more

G91 PRO

WORK HARD, PLAY HARDER

The G91 PRO exceeds all expectations with no fear. It has a supercharged 6GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage for your utmost convenience.

A FRESH PERSPECTIVE

Details every aspect of your life. The G91 PRO has a quad rear camera combination that has all the functions you need to take perfect photos.

ANDROID 11

Go straight to the stuff that matters most. Because Android 11 is optimized for how you use your phone. Giving you powerful device controls. And easier ways to manage conversations, privacy settings and so much more.

WORRY LESS, DO MORE

With 30W ultra Quick Charge, you can power up your G91 PRO over 50% in less than 30 minutes.

Expand your view to the fullest: Expand your view with the Galaxy A03 Core’s 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display and discover uncharted details. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content will look better: sharp, sharp and clear. Take amazing photos, front and back: Capture clear and beautiful photos of your favorite moments with the Galaxy A03 Core’s 8 MP main camera. You can also turn it around and use the 5 MP front camera to put the focus on you. Storage and speed you can count on: The Galaxy A03 Core combines the power of an octa-core processor with up to 2GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance, plus 32GB of internal storage. Battery to enjoy all day: Enjoy the day with a battery that accompanies your rhythm. The 5,000 mAh (typical use) battery lets you keep going for hours on end.
32GB ROM, 2GB RAM, Unisoc SC9863A (28nm), Octa-core, IMG8322 GPU, Android 11 (Go edition)
Rear Camera: 8MP, f/2.0, Digital zoom up to 4x, Front Camera: 5MP, f/2.2, Bluetooth 4.2, MicroUSB 2.0
2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900, 3G: 850/900/1700(AWS)/1900/2100, 4G LTE: B1(2100), B2(1900), B3(1800), B4(AWS), B5(850), B7(2600), B8(900), B12(700), B17(700), B28(700), B38(2600), B40(2300), B41(2500), B66(AWS-3) – Dual SIM
International Model – No Warranty in US. Compatible with Most GSM Carriers like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Cricket, Boost
